entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
